document.full_text: alfred f. kelly jr., a former president of american express, was chosen by the owners of the jets and the giants to run the host committee for the 2014 super bowl at new meadowlands stadium.
document.title: city's super bowl chooses lead host
lines_and_colors: alfred f. kelly jr., a former president of american express, was chosen by the owners of the jets and the giants to run the host committee for the 2014 super bowl at new meadowlands stadium.
